question: The Financial Stability Report (FSR) is released by which organisation?
explanation:
The Financial Stability Report (FSR) released by Reserve Bank of India has predicted that gross non-performing assets of Banks in India, may rise to 13.5% by September 2021 from the level of 7.5% in September 2020.
The report has also stated that in case of a severe stress scenario, the Gross NPA may further worsen to 14.8%.
